dmca.title: [TP-C356085C] Articles used on your website without permission - Copyright Infringem
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Friday, August 04, 2006 7:52 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [TP-C356085C] Articles used on your website without permission - Copyright Infringem ent Subject: [TP-C356085C] Articles used on your website without permission - Copyright Infringem ent From: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [TP-C356085C] Articles used on your website without permission - Copyright Infringem ent Reference: [TP-C356085C] For your review. Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ ==== Original Message ==== 1. envelope-from=violetswrl@juno.com; helo=smtp02.theplanet.com; problem=; (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Dear Sir or Madam, This letter is to inform you that currently there are 5 articles on you website that you do not have my permission to use. Please insert the following author bio giving me credit as the original author for these articles or remove them from your website immediately. You have 48 hours to comply or I will begin the formal complaint process. Rebecca Welch is a successful Webmaster and publisher of BuyHousePlansOnline.com. She provides researched information on house floor plan styles. http://www.listusfree.com/realestate/Welistfree_com/index4.htm http://www.listusfree.com/realestate/Welistfree_com/index8.htm http://www.listusfree.com/realestate/Welistfree_com/index12.htm http://www.listusfree.com/realestate/Welistfree_com/index16.htm http://www.listusfree.com/realestate/Welistfree_com/index23.htm Thank you for your immediate attention to this important matter. Rebecca A. Welch MIME element (text/html)

 

Dear Sir or Madam,

This letter is to inform you that currently there are 5 articles on you website that you do not have my permission to use.

Please insert the following author bio giving me credit as the original author for these articles or remove them from your website immediately.  You have 48 hours to comply or I will begin the formal complaint process.

Rebecca Welch is a successful Webmaster and publisher of BuyHousePlansOnline.com. She provides researched information on <a href="www.buyhouseplansonline.com">house floor plan</a> styles.

ht tp://www.listusfree.com/realestate/Welistfree_com/index4.htm

ht tp://www.listusfree.com/realestate/Welistfree_com/index8.htm

h ttp://www.listusfree.com/realestate/Welistfree_com/index12.htm

h ttp://www.listusfree.com/realestate/Welistfree_com/index16.htm

h ttp://www.listusfree.com/realestate/Welistfree_com/index23.htm

Thank you for your immediate attention to this important matter.

Rebecca A. Welch
